person.note: Li(2) Mixun [1062] Maternal grandfather was Fan(2) Kang [7216]. Because of this affinal connection, Mixun's father, Zhuan [3489], moved to Suzhou. In his declining years, Mixun returned to Fuzhou, Lianjiang xian. Ancestors were members of the Tang imperial clan. His eighth generation ancestor, Cheng [3477], was a Later Liang envoy to Min and subsequently held office as magistrate of Wenzhou, Yongjia xian, and moved the family to Fuzhou, Lianjiang xian. His great grandfather, Yuqing(3) [3554], moved to Futang xian. Mixun was Mida's [1063] elder brother. His brother Mizheng's [3520] son-in-law, Weng(1) Mengzhi [4031], was the grandson of Weng(1) Yanguo's [1956] brother, Weng(1) Yanshen [4033]. Mixun's great grandson, Shao [3525], was listed as both a Suzhou and Fuzhou, Lianjiang xian jinshi in 1211. In the Sanshan zhi, 31.41a it notes that his benguan was Suzhou. He was Tiju Fujian shibo and concurrently prefect of Quanzhou in 1231-1234. Shao's brothers, Qi [3473] and Ningzhi [3523], respectively received a university degree in 1196 and jinshi in 1211. The former was recorded in Sanshan zhi, 31.19a which listed Qi as a Lianjiang resident. The latter was recorded in both the Suzhou and Fuzhou local histories. XNYL, 6.9a, 118.13a, 119.3a, 4a, 124.20a, 125.14a; Li Mixun, WJ, 'fu,' 1a; Sanshan zhi, 27.13b, 31.19a, 41a, 32.17b; SS, 382.2a-2b, 423.4a; YLDD, 2368.8b; Fujian TZ, 148.7b. CBD, 2, 1060-1.

《宋史》卷三百八十二“李彌遜”：二十三年卒，朝廷思其忠節，詔復敷文閣待制。
《宋人傳記資料索引（電子版）》第5825條”李彌遜“：政和間累官起居郎，以封事剴切，貶知廬山縣，垂二十年。
Hartwell defined the office as Huainan yunfu (淮南運副)；《宋史》卷三百八十二。
《宋人傳記資料索引（電子版）》第5825條”李彌遜“：靖康間歷知饒州。《宋史》卷三百八十二。
直寶文閣知吉州制(苕溪集14/9)
《宋人傳記資料索引（電子版）》第5825條”李彌遜“：紹興七年復遷起居郎，鯁切如初。
《宋史》卷三百八十二“李彌遜”：七年秋遷起居郎。彌遜自政和末以上封事得貶垂二十年，及復居是職，直前論事，鯁切如初，冬試中書舍人。
Hartwell defined the office as Hubu shilang (戶部侍郎)；《宋史》卷三百八十二“李彌遜”：七年秋遷起居郎。彌遜自政和末以上封事得貶垂二十年，及復居是職，直前論事，鯁切如初。冬，試中書舍人，奏六事，……帝嘉納之，試?部侍郎。
